author: jleroux
msg: An updated ands slightly modified patch from BJ Freeman for "allow assignment of port for the Javamail container." https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/1967
currently no property for setting the port to read email from in the javamail container.

author: trawick
msg: Resolve failures with the POSIX sem implementation of APR
process mutexes (and thus global mutexes) in environments which
EINTR is now handled on the sem_* calls that are documented as
exposing EINTR in the Linux, FreeBSD, and/or Solaris docs.
There are a few other calls that haven't been updated:
